mapper.insert: insert into member (m_id, m_name, m_pw, m_subAddr, m_mainAddr, m_detailAddr, m_tel, m_birth, m_profile) Values (#{M_Id}, #{M_Name}, #{M_Pw}, #{M_SubAddr}, #{M_MainAddr}, #{M_DetailAddr}, #{M_Tel}, #{M_Birth}, #{M_Profile})

insert into farmer (f_id, f_name, f_pw, f_subAddr, f_mainAddr, f_detailAddr, f_tel, f_birth, f_profile, f_auth) Values (#{F_Id}, #{F_Name}, #{F_Pw}, #{F_SubAddr}, #{F_MainAddr}, #{F_DetailAddr}, #{F_Tel}, #{F_Birth}, #{F_Profile}, #{F_Auth})
mapper.select: select * from member where m_id = #{M_Id} and m_pw = #{M_Pw}
select * from farmer where f_id = #{F_Id} and f_pw = #{F_Pw}
SELECT m_name, m_tel, m_addr FROM member where m_id = #{m_Id};
